nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow and a slight chance of freezing drizzle. Cloudy. Low around 8, with temperatures rising to around 13 overnight. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow. Cloudy, with a high near 12. Northeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around -4. Northeast wind 2 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely after 10am. Cloudy, with a high near 14. Southeast wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 6. South wind 6 to 9 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 35. Southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 21. West wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 40. West wind 9 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 14. Northwest wind 15 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after noon. Partly sunny, with a high near 22. North wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 5. Northeast wind around 10 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 17. Northwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around -1. Northwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 8.
